metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6918 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
salt before 2015.5.5 leaks git usernames and passwords to the log.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6918` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-api - 2014.8.0
salt-cloud - 2014.8.0
salt-common - 2014.8.0
salt-master - 2014.8.0
salt-minion - 2014.8.0
salt-proxy - 2014.8.0
salt-ssh - 2014.8.0
salt-syndic - 2014.8.0
No subscription required

criterions.comment: salt package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2014.8.0').
